ygData.subject: RE: Who is the pet?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ever feel like you re the pet and Gobantik is the real PC.  I mean you pull for Gobantik, you buff Gobantik, you heal Gobantik, you furnish Gobantik with
ygData.messageBody:
Ever feel like you're the pet and Gobantik is the real PC. I mean you pull
for Gobantik, you buff Gobantik, you heal Gobantik, you furnish Gobantik
with weapons, you make it easy for Gobantik to kill the mob with things like
DoT's and Fear and Root. Gobantik doesn't have to waste time running all
over Norrath, you carry him safely in your backpack until its time to kill
something. Think Gobantik ever cons you and thinks, "Damn, I got a blue
Necromancer this time!"? Yeah sure, Gobantik talks like a kiss up, but he
knows who is really in charge!

Dicey
34th level Skeleton pet
